verses.roman:
hena nārāyaṇa,--yāṅra aṁśera aṁśa
sei prabhu nityānanda--sarva-avataṁsa

synonyms: hena—such; nārāyaṇa—Lord Nārāyaṇa; yāṅra—of whom; aṁśera—of the plenary part; aṁśa—apart; sei—that; prabhu—the Lord; nityānanda—of the name Nityānanda; sarva-avataṁsa—the source of all incarnations.
translation: That Lord Nārāyaṇa is a part of a plenary part of Lord Nityānanda Balarāma, who is the source of all incarnations.
